column4: wow, i went to buy a mac mini and they were sold out yesterday in like 1 hour after it opened
I was shocked to see that Target is going to carry the mac mini.
i went to target. they don't have it there. probably only a network thing
maybe so.  Not everything can be done using sudo (e.g. /etc/X11/xorg.conf has instructions at the top that can't be used using sudo)
